Detailed Description

Models the arrival of a customer in an event-based simulation. 

 CustomerArrivalEvent:
   choose Line
   if Line.empty?:
     T self -> StartCheckoutEvent @ t+1
   else:
     self -> Q

Member Function Documentation

void CustomerArrivalEvent::action (  )  [inline, virtual]

called when this event "happens".

The customer first chooses the "best" checkout line, then either starts checking out or waits in line.

requires Checkout, Customer, StartCheckoutEvent

Implements Event.
